title: Short-Term Course on Comparative Analysis and Development of Mobile-Based Medical Education CBL Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Program targeting current medical professionals aiming to enhance clinical competencies in smartphone-only access environments.

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze the characteristics of three CBL methodologies: gamification, simulation, and adaptive learning.
Learners can develop one prototype of mobile-optimized medical education content.
Learners can propose and present one CBL-integrated medical education scenario through project-based assessment.

resources: Free CBL Authoring Tools (e.g., Kahoot, Articulate 360)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
